subject: PROJECT NEO task created + MCP claim blocked
content: Created task NEO-VIZ-001 (Project NEO visualization strategy) with workspace workspaces/active/NEO-VIZ-001 and PLAN/RUNBOOK. MCP claim_task failed because mcp_server imports neo4j (missing module). I claimed via SQLite update as fallback. Suggest isolating MCP task tools from graph_db import or add neo4j dependency.
